description: qo (intensifier) + tol (place/location); very much at location, emphatic place marker
reasoning: Strong qo- prefix pattern (intensifier). 'tol' likely relates to 'locus' (place/location). Botanical context: specific location on plant or in text.

description: cho (makes) + tchy (to/toward earth); makes to earth, directed downward
reasoning: cho (facit/makes) prefix + tchy (contains 'chy' - ad plantam, toward plant/earth). Botanical context: growth direction, downward-growing parts.

description: qo (intensifier) + tchol (stem/stalk); very much stem, emphatic stem reference
reasoning: Strong qo- prefix (intensifier) + tchol (tangit caulem - touches stem). Combined: emphasizes stem/stalk portion of plant.

description: or (order) + aiin (is/state); in order, ordered state
reasoning: or (ordo/order) + aiin (est/erat state marker). Botanical context: arrangement, orderly pattern (leaves, petals).
